scripts.test: npm run test:deposit && npm run test:withdraw && npm run test:withdraw-bn && npm run test:deposit-bn
scripts.build: npx asc assembly/mixer/main.ts -b assembly/mixer/out/main.wasm -t assembly/mixer/out/main.wat --validate && cd assembly/mixer && gulp && cp out/main_with_websnark.wasm /home/ewasm/projects/scout.cpp-no-bignums/mixer.wasm
scripts.build:bignums: npx asc assembly/mixer/main.ts -b assembly/mixer/out/main.wasm -t assembly/mixer/out/main.wat --validate && cd assembly/mixer && gulp && cp out/main_with_websnark_bignum_hostfuncs.wasm /home/ewasm/projects/scout.cpp/mixer.wasm
